issue.title: Empty __init__.py File
issue.description: The __init__.py file is completely empty, missing required exports for the tenants feature module. Module has routers, services, models, and repositories that should be properly exported.
issue.recommendation: Add proper exports following project pattern 68: Export router with descriptive alias (e.g., tenant_router from ./routers/v1.py)

issue.title: Missing __all__ Export Declaration
issue.description: File lacks __all__ export declaration which is required by project patterns 23, 25, and 68 for feature modules to control public API and module boundaries.
issue.recommendation: Add __all__ declaration listing all exported items: router, service classes, models, and exceptions

issue.title: No Module Exports
issue.description: Python package __init__.py should export the module's public interface. This module contains substantial functionality (routers, services, models) that remains inaccessible.
issue.recommendation: Import and export: tenant_router from routers.v1, TenantService from services, tenant models from models package

issue.title: Incomplete Module Implementation
issue.description: Empty __init__.py suggests incomplete implementation or forgotten exports, creating technical debt. The module structure exists but isn't properly wired.
issue.recommendation: Complete the module implementation by adding all necessary imports and exports to make the tenants feature functional

issue.title: Missing Module Documentation
issue.description: No module-level docstring explaining the purpose and contents of the tenants feature module.
issue.recommendation: Add a module docstring explaining that this module provides tenant management functionality including CRUD operations, provisioning, and multi-tenancy support

review.summary: Empty Python package __init__.py file for the tenants feature module. The file should export the module's public interface including routers, services, models, and repositories but currently contains no code. This appears to be an incomplete implementation that needs proper exports to make the tenant management functionality accessible.

positive_observations.observation: Module structure is well-organized with proper subdirectories for routers, services, models, repositories, cache, and provisioning
The empty file itself poses no security risks as it contains no executable code
No performance concerns as the file is empty

context.tests: No test files found specifically for this __init__.py module
context.documentation: No documentation found in the file (missing module docstring)
context.configuration: Part of the tenants feature module with complete directory structure but missing exports
